item.description: ***** NEW MEET UP ***** Let's join together, get social and have fun with other single Jewish people in Connecticut! We'll get together for happy hours, dinners, music, comedy, outdoor activities, game nights, intelligent conversation or just plain laughter. We're all about reinventing ourselves and we welcome any ideas you may have for a social gathering. If you meet the love of your life through us, we'll celebrate with you! If not, you just might meet your next best friend or at least a new acquaintance who shares a similar passion.
item.name: Connecticut Jewish Singles: 35+ Social Circle
